name: Beef Stroganoff
ingredients: 2 pound chuck roast, cut into 1" cubes

instructions.en: Bring the broth, carrot and bay leaf to a boil in a pot. Remove from heat and let stand.
Melt butter in a large Dutch oven. Sauté mushrooms until tender and browned; remove and set aside.
Pat meat cubes dry, season with salt and pepper. Brown meat in oil in two batches.
Add onions and garlic to the meat; cook until onion is soft.
Add wine and strain the beef broth into the pot, discarding carrot and bay leaf.
Simmer, partly covered, for 1 1/2-2 hours or until meat is very tender.
Add mushrooms, sour cream, mustard and parsley. Adjust seasonings.
Optional: To thicken, sprinkle xanthan gum over meat, mix well, and let sit on low heat for a few minutes.

notes: This recipe makes 6 servings. Do not freeze. *The original recipe called for more butter and oil for sautéing mushrooms, but this can be reduced to 2-3 tablespoons of butter. If serving over noodles for non-keto eaters, the initial broth pot can be reused for cooking noodles.
